Were you looking for the original variant (-900)?

The Boeing 737-900ER is an extended range 737-900, and the newest 737 NG plane.

Trivia

  • The -900ER has a business jet version (BBJ), which sold three units.
  • This plane is similar Boeing 757-200, and replaces it.
